edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2011.cartagena.iface
Interface CartagenaModel

public interface CartagenaModel

This interface is implemented by those classes which represent games of Cartagena. An instance of a class which implements this interface is a single game of Cartagena and includes all state and other information necessary to describe a Cartagena game.

Method Detail

getCurrentPlayer

Player getCurrentPlayer()
Determines the current player.

Returns:
The Player who is currently moving or null if the game is over.

getWinner

Player getWinner()
Determines whether or not the game is over.

Returns:
The Player who won the game or null if no one has yet won the game.

getCards

java.util.Collection<SpaceType> getCards(Player player)
Obtains the hand of cards held by the specified player. Cards are described in terms of the type of space to which they allow the player to move. The return value for this method should make use of the Collections.unmodifiableCollection(java.util.Collection) method to prevent the caller from modifying its contents.

Parameters:
player - The player whose hand is required.
Returns:
A collection of the cards the player has.

getPieces

java.util.Collection<Player> getPieces(Location location)
Reports the owners of all pieces in the specified location. If a player owns more than one piece in the specified location, that player appears in the collection more than once. The return value for this method should make use of the Collections.unmodifiableCollection(java.util.Collection) method to prevent the caller from modifying its contents.

Parameters:
location - The location for which pieces are desired.
Returns:
A collection of the players owning each piece.

getSpaceType

SpaceType getSpaceType(Location location)
Determines, for a given location, the type of space at that location. Returns null for the initial location.

Parameters:
location - The location in question.
Returns:
The type of space at the location in question or null if the location is the initial location.

getTurnMovesLeft

int getTurnMovesLeft()
Indicates the number of moves the current player has before his or her turn ends.

Returns:
The number of moves the current player has before his or her turn ends. If the game is over, this value is zero.

movePieceForward

void movePieceForward(Location location,
                      SpaceType card)
Indicates that the current player wishes to move a piece in the specified location using the specified card. This method will produce an appropriate event on either success or failure. The player must have a piece at the specified location and have a card of the indicated type for this move to succeed.

Parameters:
location - The location from which to move the piece.
card - The type of card to use to move the piece.

movePieceBackward

void movePieceBackward(Location from,
                       Location to)
Indicates that the current player wishes to move a piece in the specified location backwards to obtain more cards. This method will produce an appropriate event on either success or failure. It is illegal to move back to a location which does not contain exactly one or two pieces. It is also illegal to move back to the initial location.

Parameters:
from - The location from which to move.
to - The location to which to move.

endTurnEarly

void endTurnEarly()
Indicates that the current player wishes to end his or her turn early, sacrificing the remaining moves. This is always legal and always generates an event.

addListener

void addListener(CartagenaModelListener listener)
Adds a CartagenaModelListener to this model. Future events will be reported to this listener.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to add.

removeListener

void removeListener(CartagenaModelListener listener)
Removes a CartagenaModelListener from this model. It will no longer receive notification of model events from this model.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to remove.
